definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program
the treaty of 1923 normalizing relations between the Soviet Union and the Northern Warlord government of China
pinyin: Zhong1 Su1 jie3 jue2 xuan2 an4 da4 gang1 xie2 ding4
containing_words.word: 中蘇解決懸案大綱協定

sentences.english: In terms of the syllabus, it's going to be online.
sentences.chinese: 至於教學大綱，網上會有。

sentences.english: So that's the piece of the syllabus that I can't tell you about.
sentences.chinese: 這就是教學大綱沒能告訴大家的。

sentences.english: The course conspectus here is for reference only.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的課程大綱僅供參考。

sentences.english: Outline based on the early loco type, with typical Shay features.
sentences.chinese: 大綱的基礎上早日買賣類型，謝伊的典型特徵。

sentences.english: I want to talk a little about the syllabus and the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 我想談一下教學大綱及要求。

sentences.english: Larry:I'm looking at my schedule and course syllabus for the next semester.
sentences.chinese: 我現在在看我下學期的課表跟課程大綱。

sentences.english: See the syllabus for the full citation.
sentences.chinese: 在課程大綱裏有完整的引用。

sentences.english: No sections this week. Look at the syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 這周沒有討論課，請看教學大綱。

sentences.english: The information is here on the syllabus.
You can reconfigure the default display order of this outline as well.
sentences.chinese: 還可以重新配置這個大綱的默認顯示順序。

sentences.english: He outlines it in the Armed Forces Journal.
sentences.chinese: 他在《武裝部隊雜誌》描出了大綱。

sentences.english: Arrange and rearrange ideas to follow your outline.
sentences.chinese: 根據你的大綱安排或者重排你的想法。

sentences.english: An outline is a common name given to a tree-shaped hierarchy in a document.
sentences.chinese: 大綱是對文檔中樹型結構的通稱。

sentences.english: If you’re writing fiction, it’s a great idea to have a plot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在寫小說，列一個情節大綱是非常棒的主意。

sentences.english: In order to maintain focus, I always try to outline my articles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保持文章中心，我總是會列出一個大綱，。

sentences.english: The content for inspection in each course will depend on the course syllabi in the department.
sentences.chinese: 各科審定內容依本系課程大綱爲準。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired
lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
